description.value:
The devil makes two attacks: one with its beard and one with its glaive.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/damage 1d8 + @mod -1 type=piercing average=true]] damage, and the target must succeed on a [[/save con 12 format=long]] or be &Reference[poisoned]{poisoned} for 1 minute. While &Reference[poisoned]{poisoned} in this way, the target can't regain hit points. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d10 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage. If the target is a creature other than an &Reference[undead]{undead} or a &Reference[construct]{construct}, it must succeed on a [[/save con 12 format=long]] or lose 5 (1d10) hit points at the start of each of its turns due to an infernal wound. Each time the devil hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 5 (1d10). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful DC 12 &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} (&Reference[med]{Medicine}) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

The devil chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning.

A bearded devil has a 30 percent chance of summoning one bearded devil.

A summoned devil appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and cant summon other devils. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Devil's Sight. Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's &Reference[darkvision]{darkvision}.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Magic Resistance. The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Steadfast. The devil can't be &Reference[frightened]{frightened} while it can see an allied creature within 30 feet of it.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
